destinations.name: Bali, Indonesia
destinations.description: Bali is known for its beautiful beaches, lush rice terraces, and ancient temples. It's a popular destination for yoga, surfing, and relaxation.
activities: Take a yoga class in Ubud

destinations.name: Paris, France
destinations.description: Paris is the city of love and lights. It's known for its museums, iconic landmarks, and delicious cuisine.
activities: Indulge in French cuisine at a brasserie

destinations.name: Cusco, Peru
destinations.description: Cusco is the gateway to Machu Picchu, one of the world's most famous ancient ruins. It's a city steeped in history and culture, with beautiful colonial architecture and stunning mountain landscapes.
activities: Explore the ruins of Machu Picchu
Shop at the San Pedro Market
Take a cooking class and learn to make ceviche
